about_the_game:
Objective

Move The Core to your destination. What is your destination you may ask. FORWARD... Don't look back and don't ask questions, just remember one thing. You can be easily replaced, The Core can't so make sure to protect it even if it costs you your life.

Obstacles

Obviously it won't be that simple. Everything on your path will try to stop you. They don't want you to succeed. Maybe they're scared of what will happen if you do, or maybe they're just evil monsters who want this world to be in chaos forever. Doesn't really matter, just pull the trigger and move on.

Equipment

And what do you have in your arsenal to deal with those obstacles? Not much, a simple firearm and a fighting spirit, but don't worry, i'm sure you'll find something useful during your journey. Although i hope you understand that the chance of you coming out of this alive are very slim.

Gameplay

Push Through Hell is a survival roguelike set in a post apocalyptic world, A world dark and cruel, where all you have to do is push the core to the very end and become a hero of this realm, Fight bosses, gain weapons and unlock upgrades that'll help you in your next attempts

Key Features

  • Unique playable characters

  • Multiple starting weapons and cores

  • Action packed gameplay

  • Dreadful Bosses

  • Lots of Customization!

  • Tens of upgrades

  • Waves of enemies

  • And much MOREE!

name: Push Through Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: Core i5-7600T
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060

short_description: Survival roguelite, where endless waves of monsters and enemies try to stop you from completing your objective. Choose your character, find upgrades and defeat bosses. Will you be able to move The Core all the way to the end, or will you die trying?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support
